building core_building
{
;	convert_to core_castle_building
	levels wooden_pallisade wooden_wall stone_wall large_stone_wall huge_stone_wall
	{
		wooden_pallisade city requires factions { gondor, northern_european, mesoamerican, middle_eastern, eastern_european, greek, southern_european, } and hidden_resource unlocked
		{
			capability
			{
				wall_level 0
				tower_level 1
				recruits_morale_bonus bonus 2 requires event_counter is_the_ai 1
				law_bonus bonus 1
				population_growth_bonus bonus +2 requires factions { all, } and event_counter AI_growth 1
			}
			material wooden
            construction  4
			cost  1300
			settlement_min village
			upgrades
			{
				wooden_wall
			}
		}
		wooden_wall city requires factions { gondor, northern_european, mesoamerican, middle_eastern, eastern_european, greek, southern_european, }
		{
			capability
			{
				wall_level 1
				gate_strength 1
				tower_level 2
			    recruits_morale_bonus bonus 2 requires event_counter is_the_ai 1
			    law_bonus bonus 1
				recruit_pool "Snow Trolls"  1   0.04   1  0  requires factions { portugal, }  and hidden_resource Rhudaur and hidden_resource ResD
			}
			material wooden
            construction  7
			cost  2300
			settlement_min town
			upgrades
			{
				stone_wall
			}
		}
		stone_wall city requires factions { gondor, northern_european, mesoamerican, middle_eastern, eastern_european, greek, southern_european, } and event_counter anduin_cities 1 and event_counter enedwaith_cities 1 and event_counter dunland_cities 1 and event_counter nd_cities 1
		{
			capability
			{
				wall_level 2
				tower_level 2
				gate_strength 1
				recruits_morale_bonus bonus 3 requires event_counter is_the_ai 1
				law_bonus bonus 1
				recruit_pool "Snow Trolls"  1   0.06 6  0  requires factions { portugal, }  and hidden_resource Rhudaur and hidden_resource ResD
				recruit_pool "Gate Keepers"  1   0.05 6  0  requires factions { normans, }  and region_religion wildmen 65
				population_growth_bonus bonus -2 requires factions { all, } and event_counter AI_growth 1
			}
			material stone
            construction  10
			cost  6200
			settlement_min large_town
			upgrades
			{
				large_stone_wall
			}
		}
		large_stone_wall city requires factions { gondor, northern_european, mesoamerican, middle_eastern, eastern_european, greek, southern_european, } and building_present_min_level masons_lodge grand_lodge and event_counter bree_isolated 1 and event_counter anduin_cities 1 and event_counter enedwaith_cities 1 and event_counter dunland_cities 1 and event_counter harad_cities 1 and event_counter nd_cities 1
		{
			capability
			{
				wall_level 3
				tower_level 2
				gate_strength 2
				recruits_morale_bonus bonus 3 requires event_counter is_the_ai 1
				law_bonus bonus 1
				recruit_pool "Snow Trolls"  1   0.08 6  0  requires factions { portugal, }  and hidden_resource Rhudaur and hidden_resource ResD
				recruit_pool "Gate Keepers"  1   0.10 6  0  requires factions { normans, }  and region_religion wildmen 65
				population_growth_bonus bonus -2 requires factions { all, } and event_counter AI_growth 1
			}
			material stone
            construction  12
			cost  9000
			settlement_min city
			upgrades
			{
				huge_stone_wall
			}
		}
		huge_stone_wall city requires factions { sicily, denmark, turks, russia, }  and hidden_resource rebuild and building_present_min_level masons_lodge north_lodge or building_present_min_level masons_lodge south_lodge
		{
			capability
			{
				wall_level 4
				tower_level 2
				gate_strength 2
				free_upkeep bonus 2
				recruits_morale_bonus bonus 3 requires event_counter is_the_ai 1
				law_bonus bonus 2
				recruit_pool "Snow Trolls"  1   0.08 6  0  requires factions { portugal, }  and hidden_resource Rhudaur and hidden_resource ResD
				recruit_pool "Gate Keepers"  1   0.12 6  0  requires factions { normans, }  and region_religion wildmen 65
				recruit_pool "Temple Wards"  1   0.05 6  0  requires factions { england, }  and region_religion catholic 75 and hidden_resource rebuild and not hidden_resource GondorEast
				recruit_pool "Melkor's Chosen"  1   0.05 6  0  requires factions { england, }  and region_religion catholic 75 and hidden_resource rebuild and not hidden_resource GondorEast
				recruit_pool "Temple Marksmen"  1   0.05 6  0  requires factions { england, }  and region_religion catholic 75 and hidden_resource rebuild and not hidden_resource GondorEast
				population_growth_bonus bonus -2 requires factions { all, } and event_counter AI_growth 1
			}
			material stone
            construction  15
			cost  14000
			settlement_min large_city
			upgrades
			{
			}
		}
	}
	plugins
	{
	}
}
building core_castle_building
{
;	convert_to core_building
	levels motte_and_bailey wooden_castle castle fortress citadel
	{
		motte_and_bailey castle requires factions { gondor, northern_european, mesoamerican, middle_eastern, eastern_european, southern_european, }
		{
			capability
			{
				wall_level 0
				tower_level 1
				free_upkeep bonus 1
				recruits_morale_bonus bonus 2 requires event_counter is_the_ai 1
				law_bonus bonus 1
				recruitment_slots 1
				recruit_pool "Northmen Militia"  1   0.1   1  0  requires factions { scotland, }  and region_religion northmen 15
				recruit_pool "Rivermen"  1   0.1   1  0  requires factions { scotland, }  and region_religion northmen 15
				recruit_pool "Haradrim Archers"  1   0.12   1  0  requires factions { spain, }  and region_religion orthodox 15

				recruit_pool "Snaga Stalkers"  1   0.15   1  0  requires factions { hre, }  and region_religion catholic 15

				population_growth_bonus bonus +2 requires factions { all, } and event_counter AI_growth 1
			}

			construction  4
			cost  1100
			settlement_min village
			upgrades
			{
				wooden_castle
			}
		}

			}

building equestrian
{
	convert_to c_equestrian
	levels stables woodelf_stables knights_stables barons_stables
	{
		stables city requires factions { france, hre, gundabad, ireland, poland, milan, mongols, scotland, sicily, denmark, spain, venice, united, }
		{
			capability
			{
				recruit_pool "Lorien Scouts"  1   0.07   1  0  requires factions { ireland, }  and region_religion elven 33
				recruit_pool "Lorien Scouts"  1   0.07   1  0  requires factions { mongols, } and region_religion elven 33 and event_counter elven_alliance_can_build_camp 1

				recruit_pool "Elven Bow Stagriders"  1   0.07   1  0  requires factions { ireland, mongols, }  and region_religion elven 33 and hidden_resource forest

				recruit_pool "Dale Cavalry"  1   0.1   2  0  requires factions { scotland, }  and region_religion northmen 25

				recruit_pool "Gondor Cavalry Militia"  1   0.1   2  0  requires factions { sicily, denmark, }  and region_religion islam 25
				recruit_pool "Pinnath Gelin Cavalry"  1   0.09   2  0  requires factions { sicily, denmark, }  and region_religion islam 50 and hidden_resource GondorWest and hidden_resource ResB
				recruit_pool "Pinnath Gelin Cavalry"  1   0.09   2  0  requires factions { sicily, denmark, }  and region_religion islam 50 and hidden_resource Enedwaith and hidden_resource ResK


				recruit_pool "Warg Marauders"  1   0.13   2  0  requires factions { france, gundabad, poland, }  and region_religion catholic 33

				recruit_pool "Rohirrim"  1   0.1   2  0  requires factions { milan, }  and region_religion northmen 25
				recruit_pool "Rohirrim Archers"  1   0.1   2  0  requires factions { milan, }  and region_religion northmen 25
				recruit_pool "Eored Skirmishers"  1   0.1   1  0  requires factions { milan, }  and region_religion northmen 40

				recruit_pool "Warg Riders"  1   0.13   2  0  requires factions { hre, }  and region_religion catholic 25
				recruit_pool "Warg Pack"  1   0.13   2  0  requires factions { hre, }  and region_religion catholic 25

				recruit_pool "Southron Lancers"  1   0.1   2  0  requires factions { spain, }  and region_religion orthodox 25

				recruit_pool "Claw-Guard"  1   0.1   2  0  requires factions { venice, }  and region_religion orthodox 35 and event_counter arulad_clan_joins 1

				trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1 requires event_counter is_the_ai 1
			}
			material wooden
            construction  6
			cost  2100
			settlement_min town
			upgrades
			{
				woodelf_stables
				knights_stables
			}
		}
		woodelf_stables city requires factions { ireland, mongols, } and building_present_min_level city_hall city_hall
		{
			capability
			{
				recruit_pool "Lorien Scouts"  1   0.14 6  0  requires factions { ireland, }  and region_religion elven 33
				recruit_pool "Lorien Scouts"  1   0.14 6  0  requires factions { mongols, } and region_religion elven 33 and event_counter elven_alliance_can_build_camp 1
				recruit_pool "Hitherbin"  1   0.14 6  0  requires factions { ireland, } and region_religion elven 75
				recruit_pool "Galadhrim Cavalry"  1   0.14 6  0  requires factions { ireland, } and region_religion elven 75 and hidden_resource silvan_capital

				recruit_pool "Elven Bow Stagriders"  1   0.14 6  0  requires factions { mongols, }  and region_religion elven 33 and hidden_resource forest
				recruit_pool "Elven Bow Stagriders"  1   0.14 6  0  requires factions { ireland, }  and region_religion elven 33 and hidden_resource forest and event_counter elven_alliance_can_build_camp 1
				recruit_pool "Arthirochon"  1   0.14 6  0  requires factions { mongols, } and region_religion elven 75

				trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1 requires event_counter is_the_ai 1
			}
			material wooden
            construction  8
			cost  4100
			settlement_min large_town
			upgrades
			{
			}
		}
		knights_stables city requires factions { milan, gundabad, hre, scotland, denmark, spain, venice, united, sicily, poland, france, }  and building_present_min_level city_hall city_hall
		{

				recruit_pool "Warg Riders"  1   0.26 6  0  requires factions { hre, }  and region_religion catholic 25
				recruit_pool "Warg Pack"  1   0.26 6  0  requires factions { hre, }  and region_religion catholic 25

;#################  WILDMEN BARRACKS' ######################

{
	convert_to anduin_barracks_castle

building forest_camps
{
	levels hunting_camp lumber_camp
	{
		hunting_camp requires factions { turks, normans, byzantium, } and hidden_resource forest and event_counter dorwinion_men 1 or event_counter lumbercamp 1
		{
			capability
			{
				free_upkeep bonus 1
				income_bonus bonus 32 requires factions { turks, byzantium, }
				income_bonus bonus 32 requires factions { normans, } and not event_counter bree_military 1
				income_bonus bonus 48 requires factions { normans, } and event_counter bree_military 1
			}
			material wooden
			construction  3
			cost  1000
			settlement_min village
			upgrades
			{
				lumber_camp
			}
		}
		lumber_camp requires factions { turks, normans, byzantium, } and hidden_resource forest and event_counter dorwinion_men 1 or event_counter lumbercamp 1
		{
			capability
			{
				recruit_pool "Lumbermen"  1   0.15 6  0  requires factions { normans, }  and region_religion wildmen 10
				recruit_pool "Lumbermen"  1   0.15 6  0  requires factions { turks, }  and region_religion islam 10
				recruit_pool "Lumbermen"  1   0.07 6  0  requires factions { byzantium, } and region_religion northmen 10 and event_counter dorwinion_men 1
				free_upkeep bonus 1
				income_bonus bonus 32 requires factions { turks, byzantium, }
				income_bonus bonus 32 requires factions { normans, } and not event_counter bree_military 1
				income_bonus bonus 48 requires factions { normans, } and event_counter bree_military 1
			}
			material wooden
			construction 5
			cost  2000
			settlement_min village
			upgrades
			{
			}
		}
	}
	plugins

	}
}

		{

				recruit_pool "Human Boat"  1   0.07   1  0  requires factions { spain, aztecs, portugal, scotland, byzantium, mongols, ireland, } and hidden_resource boats
				recruit_pool "Human Boat"  1   0.07   1  0  requires factions { khand, } and hidden_resource boats  and event_counter khand_loyal 1
				recruit_pool "Human Boat"  1   0.07   1  0  requires factions { venice, } and hidden_resource boats and event_counter naval_clan_joins 1

building taverns
{
	levels brothel inn
	{
		brothel city requires factions { sicily, milan, scotland, turks, byzantium, spain, venice, england, france, hre, gundabad, portugal, mongols, moors, denmark, poland, russia, ireland, saxons, aztecs, timurids, hungary, teutonic_order, norway, united, khand, normans, }
		{
			capability
			{
				agent spy  0
				agent_limit spy 1
				income_bonus bonus 40 requires factions { sicily, milan, scotland, turks, byzantium, spain, venice, england, france, hre, gundabad, portugal, mongols, moors, denmark, poland, russia, ireland, saxons, aztecs, timurids, hungary, teutonic_order, norway, united, khand, }
				income_bonus bonus 40 requires factions { normans, } and not event_counter bree_military 1
				income_bonus bonus 32 requires factions { normans, } and event_counter bree_military 1
				recruit_pool "Keefei Huntsmen"  1   0.15   6  0  requires factions { teutonic_order, }  and region_religion wildmen 25
			}
			material wooden
            construction  3
			cost  1300
			settlement_min town
			upgrades
			{
				inn
			}
		}
		inn city requires factions { sicily, milan, scotland, turks, byzantium, spain, venice, england, france, hre, gundabad, portugal, mongols, moors, denmark, poland, russia, ireland, saxons, aztecs, timurids, hungary, teutonic_order, norway, united, khand, normans, }
		{
			capability
			{
				agent spy  0
				agent_limit spy 1
				income_bonus bonus 120 requires factions { sicily, milan, scotland, turks, byzantium, spain, venice, england, france, hre, gundabad, portugal, mongols, moors, denmark, poland, russia, ireland, saxons, aztecs, timurids, hungary, teutonic_order, norway, united, khand, }
				income_bonus bonus 120 requires factions { normans, } and not event_counter bree_military 1
				income_bonus bonus 100 requires factions { normans, } and event_counter bree_military 1
				happiness_bonus bonus 1
				recruit_pool "Keefei Huntsmen"  1   0.2   6  0  requires factions { teutonic_order, }  and region_religion wildmen 25
			}
			material wooden
            construction  5
			cost  2000

building dorwinion_barracks
{
	convert_to dorwinion_barracks_castle
	levels thorn_barracks thorn_armoury regent_barracks regent_armoury avari_barracks avari_armoury
	{
		thorn_barracks city requires factions { byzantium, }
		{
			capability
			{
				recruit_pool "Thorn Bladesmen"  1   0.1   2  0  requires factions { byzantium, }  and region_religion northmen 33
				recruit_pool "Thorn Guard"  1   0.1   2  0  requires factions { byzantium, }  and region_religion northmen 33
				recruit_pool "Thorn Crossbowmen"  1   0.1   2  0  requires factions { byzantium, }  and region_religion northmen 33

			}

			construction  4
			cost  3500
			settlement_min town
			upgrades
			{
				thorn_armoury
			}
		}
		thorn_armoury city requires factions { byzantium, }  and building_present_min_level city_hall council_chambers
		{
			capability
			{
				recruit_pool "Thorn Bladesmen"  1   0.15 6  0  requires factions { byzantium, }  and region_religion northmen 33
				recruit_pool "Thorn Guard"  1   0.15 6  0  requires factions { byzantium, }  and region_religion northmen 33

building hinterland_glittering_caves
{
    levels glittering_caves_empty glittering_caves_completed glittering_caves_upgraded glittering_caves_abandoned
    {
		glittering_caves_empty castle requires factions { }
		{
			capability
			{
				happiness_bonus bonus -3 requires factions { milan, } and event_counter rohan_dwarves_turmoil 1
			}
			material stone
			construction 1
			cost 0
			settlement_min village
			upgrades
			{
			glittering_caves_completed
			}
		}
        glittering_caves_completed castle requires factions { }
        {
            capability
            {
				free_upkeep bonus 1 requires factions { milan, }
				recruit_pool "Guard of the Caves" 1 0.12 6 0 requires factions { milan, }
				construction_cost_bonus_stone bonus 10 requires factions { milan, }
				construction_cost_bonus_wooden bonus 10 requires factions { milan, }
				taxable_income_bonus bonus 10 requires factions { milan, }
            }
            material stone
            construction 1
            cost 0
            settlement_min village
            upgrades
            {
		glittering_caves_upgraded
            }
        }
        glittering_caves_upgraded castle requires factions { }
        {
            capability
            {
				construction_cost_bonus_stone bonus 10 requires factions { milan, norway, hungary, moors, }
				construction_cost_bonus_wooden bonus 10 requires factions { milan, norway, hungary, moors, }
				taxable_income_bonus bonus 10 requires factions { milan, norway, hungary, moors, }
				free_upkeep bonus 1 requires factions { milan, norway, hungary, moors, }
				income_bonus bonus 100 requires factions { milan, norway, hungary, moors, }
				population_growth_bonus bonus 1 requires factions { milan, norway, hungary, moors, }
				recruit_pool "Guard of the Caves" 1 0.2 6 0 requires factions { milan, }
				trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1 requires factions { milan ,norway, hungary, moors, }
				armour 4 requires factions { milan, }
				gate_strength 5
            }
			faction_capability
			{
				taxable_income_bonus bonus 5 requires factions { milan, }
				construction_cost_bonus_stone bonus 5 requires factions { milan, }
			}
            material stone
            construction 1
            cost 0
            settlement_min village
            upgrades
            {
		glittering_caves_abandoned
            }
        }
		glittering_caves_abandoned castle requires factions { }
		{
			capability
			{
				happiness_bonus bonus -1 requires factions { milan, }
			}
			material stone
			construction 1
			cost 0
			settlement_min village
			upgrades
			{
			}
		}
    }
    plugins
    {
    }
}
